channel.title: Monthly on ZJeapo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Monthly on ZJeapo's Blog

item.title: March 2024
item.description: Mar 19 The more I worked for other people, the more I wanted to be my own boss. Duolingo’s sentences Did you hear that the teacher had to suspend Kevin from school for stealing? They were holding hands. The worse the boss treats me, the more I want to retire. I guess I shouldn’t treat myself so badly. Mar 18 Today, I feel extremely tired. and I seldom learn to speak or listen all day.
